comments:
I get a NullPointerException when I try a Pull Up refactoring, even with these classes:

-- Base.java:
namespace net.mycorp;
public class Base {}

-- Sub.java:
namespace net.mycorp;
public class Sub extends Base {
    public void foo() {}
}

Darwin Gordons-MacBook-Pro.local 8.6.1 Darwin Kernel Version 8.6.1: Tue Mar  7 16:55:45 PST 2006; root:xnu-792.9.22.obj~1/RELEASE_I386 i386 i386

I'm downloading 3.2RC1 right now to test with that?
